attributes.action: Start trails to test the effectiveness of Vitamin D against Covid-19 vs vaccines
attributes.additional_details: Constantly taking vaccines for new variants is time consuming, impractical, potentially dangerous, costly, and creates difficulties for everyday people which inevitably will not be good for mental health especially when travelling abroad. Travelling abroad is already difficult due to security issues. Direct or indirect Covid-19 passports will only make things worst so if there is another option that saves us from all of the above it's should be explored.
attributes.background: Start the trials ASAP and before everyone has been given the vaccine as there would be no subjects left to test for the effectiveness of Vitamin D against Covid-19.
